Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Creates the Albany county renewable energy authority
Summary: Creates the Albany county renewable energy authority.
LawCode: Add Art 5 Title 10-E §§1233 - 1255, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to creating the Albany county renewable energy authority
